thread.section_title: SelfStorage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelfStorage.com | www.selfstorage.com | 6 of 630
thread.title: Lynne Cheek

author: Lynne Cheek
title: Lynne Cheek
text:
As a first time customer, I was concerned about a possible lengthy sign-on process.
The gentleman, Richard, who assisted me was extremely helpful, patient and informative. He easily guided me through this initial process with very little confusion, answered my questions, explained & showed me storage options - all this in a short time period! I signed-on and left feeling very satisfied about my entire experience. THANK YOU!
